Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_APRegisterUDFAttir' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_APRegisterUDFAttir] GO CREATE VIEW v_APRegisterUDFAttir AS SELECT APRegister.CompanyID, APRegister.DocType, APRegister.RefNbr, APRegisterKvExt.FieldName, APRegisterKvExt.ValueString, APRegisterKvExt.ValueText FROM APRegister LEFT JOIN APRegisterKvExt on APRegisterKvExt.CompanyID = APRegister.CompanyID and APRegisterKvExt.RecordID = APRegister.NoteID
